## 前台销售

```{r}
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
data = read_excel("data_dict.xlsx")
DT::datatable(data %>% dplyr::filter(`表名`=="GRESA_SA_DOC") %>% select(-`业务`), rownames = FALSE, filter="top")
```

```{r}
DT::datatable(data %>% dplyr::filter(`表名`=="GRESA_SA_DTL") %>% select(-`业务`), rownames = FALSE, filter="top")
```
